content.title: Delete Security Rule in PAN-OS (v11.0+)
content.summary: Deletes an existing security rule in a specified configuration scope such as 'vsys'. The rule name must be provided in the 'name' query parameter. The 'vsys' parameter is required when the location is 'vsys'.

required_query_parameters.location: Defines the configuration scope, such as 'vsys' or 'shared'.
required_query_parameters.vsys: Required when location is 'vsys'. Example: vsys1.
required_query_parameters.name: Specifies the name of the security rule to delete.

common_errors: 400: Missing or invalid query parameters (location, vsys, or name)
404: Rule not found in the specified scope
409: Rule cannot be deleted because it is locked or referenced elsewhere
